  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Deprecated. 
    Use HibernatePersistenceProvider instead

public class HibernatePersistence
extends HibernatePersistenceProvider
implements PersistenceProvider, AvailableSettings
    Hibernate EJB3 persistence provider implementation
